mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hall_seats (performanceId, hallId, seatBlock, seatRow, seatCol, seatRate, mateGroup) VALUES (#{performanceId}, #{hallId}, #{seatBlock}, #{seatRow}, #{seatCol}, #{seatRate}, #{mateNo})
mapper.select: SELECT a.name, a.address, a.gpsX, a.gpsY FROM hall_info_main a JOIN performance_info b ON a.id = b.hallInfoId WHERE b.id = #{value}

SELECT a.performanceId, a.hallId, b.groupSize, a.seatBlock, a.seatRow, a.seatCol, b.seatRate, a.mateGroup as mateNo, b.category as categoryId, a.seatStatus FROM hall_seats a JOIN mate_main b ON a.mateGroup = b.id WHERE a.performanceId = #{value}
